data.actual_result: The play and pause button is only shown for gifs that are not directly uploaded to Discord.
data.expected_result: A pause and play button should be shown when clicking on the gif in the image preview mode.
data.short_description: Play/Pause button for gifs directly uploaded to Discord missing
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload any gif - Click on the uploaded gif to open the preview - Click again on the gif and observe it
